verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the publicans <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> were drawing <S%G2258><s%> near <S%G1448><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> both the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> murmured <S%G1234><s%>, saying <S%G3754><s%>, This man <S%G3778><s%> receiveth <S%G4327><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> eateth <S%G4906><s%> with them <S%G846><s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> a hundred <S%G1540><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> having lost <S%G622><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, doth <S%G2641><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> leave <S%G2641><s%> the ninety and nine <S%G1768><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> after <S%G1909><s%> that which <S%G3588><s%> is lost <S%G622><s%>, until <S%G2193><s%> he find <S%G2147><s%> it <S%G846><s%>?
And <S%G2532><s%> when he hath found <S%G2147><s%> it <S%G2007><s%>, he layeth it on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> shoulders <S%G5606><s%>, rejoicing <S%G5463><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he cometh2064, 1519 home <S%G3624><s%>, he calleth together <S%G4779><s%> his friends <S%G5384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his neighbors <S%G1069><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Rejoice with <S%G4796><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>, for <S%G3754><s%> I have found <S%G2147><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was lost <S%G622><s%>.

I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> even so <S%G3779><s%> there shall be <S%G2071><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> sinner <S%G268><s%> that repenteth <S%G3340><s%>, more than <S%G2228><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> ninety and nine <S%G1768><s%> righteous persons <S%G1342><s%>, who3748, 2192 need <S%G5532><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%>.

Or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> pieces of silver <S%G1406><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> she lose <S%G622><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> piece <S%G1406><s%>, doth <S%G681><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> light <S%G681><s%> a lamp <S%G3088><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sweep <S%G4563><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> diligently <S%G1960><s%> until2193, 3755 she find it <S%G2147><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> when she hath found <S%G2147><s%> it <S%G4779><s%>, she calleth together <S%G4779><s%> her friends <S%G5384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> neighbors <S%G1069><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Rejoice with <S%G4796><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>, for <S%G3754><s%> I have found <S%G2147><s%> the piece <S%G1406><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I had lost <S%G622><s%>.

Even so <S%G3779><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, there is <S%G1096><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> in the presence of <S%G1799><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> sinner <S%G268><s%> that repenteth <S%G3340><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>, A certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G444><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> the younger <S%G3501><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G3962><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%>, give <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> the portion <S%G3313><s%> of thy substance <S%G3776><s%> that falleth <S%G1911><s%> to me <S%G2532><s%>. And he divided <S%G1244><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> his living <S%G979><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> after <S%G3326><s%>, the younger <S%G3501><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> gathered <S%G4863><s%> all <S%G537><s%> together <S%G4863><s%> and took his journey <S%G589><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a far <S%G3117><s%> country <S%G5561><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> he wasted <S%G1287><s%> his <S%G846><s%> substance <S%G3776><s%> with riotous <S%G811><s%> living <S%G2198><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> had spent <S%G1159><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, there arose <S%G1096><s%> a mighty <S%G2478><s%> famine <S%G3042><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> country <S%G5561><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to be in want <S%G5302><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he went <S%G4198><s%> and joined himself <S%G2853><s%> to <S%G1520><s%> one of the citizens <S%G4177><s%> of that <S%G1565><s%> country <S%G5561><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he sent <S%G3992><s%> him <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> fields <S%G68><s%> to feed <S%G1006><s%> swine <S%G5519><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he would fain <S%G1937><s%> have filled <S%G1072><s%> his <S%G846><s%> belly <S%G2836><s%> with <S%G575><s%> the husks <S%G2769><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> the swine <S%G5519><s%> did eat <S%G2068><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>.

But when he came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>, How many <S%G4214><s%> hired servants <S%G3407><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> father <S%G3962><s%>'s have bread <S%G740><s%> enough and <S%G1161><s%> to spare <S%G4052><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> here with hunger <S%G3042><s%>!

I will arise <S%G450><s%> and go <S%G4198><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> father <S%G3962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> will say <S%G2046><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%>, I have sinned <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in thy <S%G4675><s%> sight <S%G1799><s%>:

I <S%G2532><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to be called <S%G2564><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> son <S%G5207><s%>: make <S%G4160><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> hired servants <S%G3407><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he arose <S%G450><s%>, and came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> father <S%G3962><s%>. But <S%G1161><s%> while he <S%G846><s%> was <S%G568><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> afar off <S%G3112><s%>, his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> was moved with compassion <S%G4697><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ran <S%G5143><s%>, and fell <S%G1968><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> neck <S%G5137><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> kissed <S%G2705><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%>, I have sinned <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1799><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> sight <S%G1799><s%>: I <S%G2532><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to be called <S%G2564><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> son <S%G5207><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the father <S%G3962><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%>, Bring forth <S%G1627><s%> quickly the best <S%G4413><s%> robe <S%G4749><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G1746><s%> it on <S%G1746><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G1325><s%> a ring <S%G1146><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shoes <S%G5266><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his feet <S%G4228><s%>:
and <S%G2532><s%> bring <S%G5342><s%> the fatted <S%G4618><s%> calf <S%G3448><s%>, and kill <S%G2380><s%> it <S%G2532><s%>, and let us eat <S%G5315><s%>, and make merry <S%G2165><s%>:

for <S%G3778><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is alive again <S%G2532><s%>; he was <S%G2258><s%> lost <S%G622><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is found <S%G2147><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> they began <S%G756><s%> to be merry <S%G2165><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> elder <S%G4245><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the field <S%G68><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> and drew nigh <S%G1448><s%> to the house <S%G3614><s%>, he heard <S%G191><s%> music <S%G4858><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> dancing <S%G5525><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G4341><s%> to him one <S%G1520><s%> of the servants <S%G3816><s%>, and inquired4441, 846 what <S%G5101><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> might be <S%G1498><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G3754><s%>, Thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> is come <S%G2240><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> hath killed <S%G2380><s%> the fatted <S%G4618><s%> calf <S%G3448><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> he hath received <S%G618><s%> him <S%G846><s%> safe and sound <S%G5198><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he was angry <S%G3710><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> go in <S%G1525><s%>: and <S%G3767><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out <S%G1831><s%>, and entreated <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G3962><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%>, Lo <S%G2400><s%>, these many <S%G5118><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> do I serve <S%G1398><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G3928><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> transgressed a commandment <S%G1785><s%> of thine <S%G4675><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> yet thou <S%G1325><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> gavest <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> a kid <S%G2056><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I might make merry <S%G2165><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> friends <S%G5384><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> came <S%G2064><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> hath devoured <S%G2719><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> living <S%G979><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> harlots <S%G4204><s%>, thou killedst <S%G2380><s%> for him <S%G846><s%> the fatted <S%G4618><s%> calf <S%G3448><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Son <S%G5043><s%>, thou <S%G4771><s%> art <S%G1488><s%> ever <S%G3842><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that is mine <S%G1699><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> thine <S%G4674><s%>.

But it was meet <S%G1163><s%> to make merry <S%G2165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be glad <S%G5463><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is alive again <S%G326><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> lost <S%G622><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> is found <S%G2147><s%>.
